To enable email functionality, you need to set up EmailJS:

  1. Go to emailjs.com and create a free account
  2. Create an Email Service (Gmail, Outlook, etc.)
  3. Create email templates for each type (welcome, notification, etc.)
  4. Copy your credentials below
